extendedInfo.description: Fly Library is an android application developed to act as a central repository for fly tying patterns. The Fly Library contains a catalog of both freshwater and saltwater flies as well as detailed instructions on how to tie them.  You don't have to carry a tying manual, or have internet access to get your favorite patterns anymore!  Quick and easy to use, a great tool for any fly tyers!

reviews.title: simply amazing
reviews.comment: The app provided me with comprehensive steps on knots for my fly fishing, As a rookie and starter in Fly Fishing, I find it very helpful in this well-documented app that provided method of tying .  Highly recommended - Kudos Eric
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thumbs up
reviews.comment: Excellent,  great tool for any fly fisherman.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simply outstanding!
reviews.comment: This is far and away the best app on android for serious fly tyers.  I have a large collection of fly patterns in Fly Source on my Windows desktop.  Now I can import them into Fly Library on both droid devices, Galaxy S3 and ASUS tablet.  Thanks Eric - ya done good!
reviews.author: Bob Hendry

reviews.title: Great...but...
reviews.comment: Love the app, but wish there was more freshwater flies and or a way of adding your own!
reviews.author: steve hepworth

reviews.title: Libary of 40 flies
reviews.comment: No salt water paterns and a libary of only 40 yes 40 flies if this is a new app and new paterns are going to be added on a daily basis then it could be quite good but as it stands very  poor.
reviews.author: ewar woowoo

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: We\'re adding more and more flies!  Great for locations with no internet connectivity.
reviews.author: Eric I
